results.title: [Lipoatrophic diabetes with insulin resistance controlled by metformin].

results.title: Efficacy of pioglitazone in familial partial lipodystrophy of the Dunnigan type: a case report.
results.text_hl: We report a very rapid and good efficacy of @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@ added to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ without side effects in @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy_Familial_Partial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052496 @@@FPLD2@@@.

citations.NLM: Moreau F, Boullu-Sanchis S, Vigouroux C, Lucescu C, Lascols O, Sapin R, Ruimy D, Guerci B, Pinget M, Jeandidier N. Efficacy of pioglitazone in familial partial lipodystrophy of the Dunnigan type: a case report. Diabetes Metab. 2007 Nov;33(5):385-9. PMID: 17936664

results.title: LMNA gene mutation as a model of cardiometabolic dysfunction: from genetic analysis to treatment response.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Very rapid and good results with no side-effects were achieved with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy_Familial_Partial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052496 @@@FPLD@@@.

citations.NLM: Chirico V, Ferraù V, Loddo I, Briuglia S, Amorini M, Salpietro V, Lacquaniti A, Salpietro C, Arrigo T. LMNA gene mutation as a model of cardiometabolic dysfunction: from genetic analysis to treatment response. Diabetes Metab. 2014 Jun;40(3):224-8. PMID: 24485160
citations.BibTeX: @article{24485160, title={LMNA gene mutation as a model of cardiometabolic dysfunction: from genetic analysis to treatment response.}, author={Chirico V and Ferraù V and Loddo I and Briuglia S and Amorini M and Salpietro V and Lacquaniti A and Salpietro C and Arrigo T}, journal={Diabetes Metab}, volume={40}, number={3}, pages={224-8}}

results.title: Familial partial lipodystrophy associated with the heterozygous LMNA mutation 1445G>A (Arg482Gln) in a Polish family.
results.text_hl: A genetic test revealed the presence of a heterozygous LMNA gene mutation: @VARIANT_p.R482Q_LMNA_human @VARIANT_tmVar:c|SUB|G|1445|A;HGVS:c.1445G>A;VariantGroup:0;CorrespondingGene:4000;RS#:11575937;CorrespondingSpecies:9606;CA#:14814 @@@c.1445G>A@@@, consistent with the "hot spot" for @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy_Familial_Partial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052496 @@@FPLD@@@. Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to improve @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ and address the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ proved successful.

citations.NLM: Drac H, Madej-Pilarczyk A, Gospodarczyk-Szot K, Gaweł M, Kwieciński H, Hausmanowa-Petrusewicz I. Familial partial lipodystrophy associated with the heterozygous LMNA mutation 1445G>A (Arg482Gln) in a Polish family. Neurol Neurochir Pol. 2010 May-Jun;44(3):291-6. PMID: 20625965
citations.BibTeX: @article{20625965, title={Familial partial lipodystrophy associated with the heterozygous LMNA mutation 1445G>A (Arg482Gln) in a Polish family.}, author={Drac H and Madej-Pilarczyk A and Gospodarczyk-Szot K and Gaweł M and Kwieciński H and Hausmanowa-Petrusewicz I}, journal={Neurol Neurochir Pol}, volume={44}, number={3}, pages={291-6}}
